function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible transmission of contagious diseases due to close contact and social interaction","Impact":"Spread of the disease and heightened risk of infection","Mitigation":"Implementing strict social distancing measures and proper hygiene practices","Technologies":"Contact-tracing apps, temperature screening technology","People":"Study participants, general public","Owner":"Health authorities, researchers"},{"Description":"Elevated fear and anxiety leading to mental health problems","Impact":"High levels of stress and anxiety, mental health problems","Mitigation":"Providing mental health support and resources, promoting positive coping mechanisms","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps","People":"People in social isolation, general public","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Decreased engagement in protective behaviors due to negative emotional response","Impact":"Reduced adherence to protective measures, increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Educating the public about the importance of protective behaviors, addressing the psychological impact of fear and anxiety","Technologies":"Health education apps, telehealth services","People":"Study participants, general public","Owner":"Health organizations, researchers"}]}
